name: From TV Animation - One Piece: Grand Battle Swan Colosseum
summary: Grand Battle! Swan Colosseum is the third game is the Grand Battle series. It's more of a spin-off game than a sequel to Grand Battle! 2. It was released on the Japan-only console Wonderswan Color on July 12, 2002. It was developed and published by Namco Bandai.

alternative_names.name: One Piece: Grand Battle Swan Colosseum
